data.why:
I've wrote pure-perl CVS repository parsing module, which supports
    all CVS features and don't need installed cvs. I use it in my
    cvs2svn.pl converter (will be relased under BSD license soon), and
    it works well. I want to share this module with community, and allow
    others to instal it without installing my cvs2svb.pl script. I could
    not find nothing, compared to my module, on CPAN: some modules need
    cvs installed, and other doesn't support some aspects: branches,
    tags, etc.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (LION; Lev A, Serebryakov)
